metadata.title: CVE-2014-3625 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in Pivotal Spring Framework 3.0.4 through3.2.x before 3.2.12, 4.0.x before 4.0.8, and 4.1.x before 4.1.2 allowsremote attackers to read arbitrary files via unspecified vectors, relatedto static resource handling.

criterions.comment: libspring-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
